item.title: Blog
item.description: R Studio and Python R Studio and Python can communicate together and can perform similar functions. Below is an example of using R Studio and Python to achieve similar results. Using R Studio, one can switch from R to Python easily. Example: data("quakes") summary(quakes) ## lat long depth mag ## Min. :-38.59 Min. :165.7 Min. : 40.0 Min. :4.00 ## 1st Qu.:-23.47 1st Qu.:179.6 1st Qu.: 99.0 1st Qu.:4.30 ## Median :-20.
